settings.subtitle: Let's hang out!
settings.title: EVENT CALENDAR
settings.text: Not to be confused with our robust cooking class calendar, we schedule and host other types of events in The Cook’s Station space that are open to the community – such as food trucks, wine tastings, chef’s table dinners, product demos, lunch-and-learns, cookbook releases and more.

settings.title: HOST WITH US
settings.text: We love to party, which is good news since we’re so darn good at it! Want to co-host a special or private event with us? Let’s make some plans.

settings.title: CATERING
settings.text: We cater special and private events on TCS premises (often in tandem with our private event space rental), as well as our patrons’ events offsite such as business lunches, tailgates, showers, picnics and whatever else y’all can dream up.

settings.title: SPONSORSHIPS
settings.text: We gladly accept donation and sponsorship requests from non-profit 501(c)3 organizations with 80 percent or more of funding directed at supporting initiatives within our community. In addition to cash donations, we occasionally provide in-kind donations of bottled water, gift cards and coupons.
